posts.post_title: FS: SGC graded EPDGs. Nice group!
posts.post_content:
Some SGC graded EPDGs available. Price includes  tracked shipping.

Some nice ones here I recently swapped out with PSA graded ones, so making them available. I can be reached via PM with any questions.

Thanks for looking!
Jeff
